thread.title: Rebel Wilson Dresses as Amy Winehouse for 'Pitch Perfect 3'
thread.title_full: Rebel Wilson Dresses as Amy Winehouse for 'Pitch Perfect 3'

author: Just Jared
title: Rebel Wilson Dresses as Amy Winehouse for 'Pitch Perfect 3'
text:
Rebel Wilson was seen wearing a costume resembling the late Amy Winehouse ‘s signature look on the set of Pitch Perfect 3 .
The 36-year-old actress dressed up as Amy , who passed away back in 2011 at the age of 27, for the day of filming on Monday (January 30) in Atlanta, Ga.
Also seen on set that day were Elizabeth Banks , Anna Kendrick , and actor John Michael Higgins .
The film is set to hit theaters later this year on December 22, 2017. Be sure to check it out – most of the cast will be returning for the third installment!
